text: Otlile "Oti" Mabuse (born 8 August 1990) is a South African professional dancer, talent show judge and television presenter who lives in the United Kingdom. She is known for being a professional dancer on the reality television show Strictly Come Dancing and the German version of the show. She was a celebrity judge on The Greatest Dancer and is currently a panellist on The Masked Dancer. Mabuse is also a judge on Dancing on Ice. ==Sources== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Dancers Category:People from Pretoria Category:South African entertainers
title: Oti Mabuse
